name: Soap Miner

We‚Äôre committed to transparency and quality, so you can trust that each product is free from harmful chemicals and artificial additives.

We view soap making as an art, a harmonious blend of nature‚Äôs bounties that speaks to our commitment to sustainability and wellness. Our products are not just soaps; they are a reflection of our passion for purity and self-care.

description: Heart & Soil was founded in 2020 by Paul Saladino, MD so more people could enjoy the nourishment of organs in a clean, convenient and taste-free capsule.  Organs are the most nutrient-rich foods on the planet. You can get 100 times more nutrients from organs compared to muscle meats! They include everything your body needs to thrive: vitamins, minerals, peptides, proteins, and growth factors. That‚Äôs why our ancestors were strong, virile, and vital! That‚Äôs how they thrived generation after generation in the world‚Äôs harshest environments. And that‚Äôs why we‚Äôre making treasured organs easily accessible.

CLARA & FRITZ IS A FAMILY-OWNED SHOP SPECIALIZING IN PROVIDING CLEAN, SIMPLE SKIN CARE.

name: Salt of the Earth
description:
Welcome to Salt of the Earth, your trusted source of premium electrolyte products. Founded in 2023 by a group of friends in Bali who share a deep passion for surfing and fitness, our company emerged from the common desire to maintain peak performance and optimal hydration amidst the breathtaking waves of Bali. We've used the highest levels of sports nutrition testing and have worked with former Gatorade Sports Science Institute athletes to develop our formula.
At Salt of the Earth, we are dedicated to upholding excellence in quality, taste, and performance. Recognizing the vital role of electrolytes in sustaining optimal hydration levels, particularly during strenuous physical endeavors, we have meticulously designed our electrolyte products to deliver unrivaled hydration and maintain an ideal electrolyte equilibrium.

name: The LeatherMint
description:
Located in the historic neighborhood of Quartier Saint-Henri in Montr√©al, where leathercraft was born during the foundation of Nouvelle-France, The LeatherMint is rebuilding from the ground up‚Äîthis time, on the Bitcoin standard. We are a sovereign and hyperbitcoinized business dedicated to financial independence and craftsmanship. Our operation is unregistered by design, as we believe in commerce without permission, upholding the values of freedom and autonomy that Bitcoin represents.

Full grain leather and solid brass hardware. Belts, Wallets, Sleeves for Hardware Signing Devices, Passport Holders.

name: Ketolish
description:
Low sugar beef jerky that‚Äôs deliciously made in Minnesota using locally-sourced lean ground meats and quality ingredients. Payment only in sats. DM or email to receive the payment invoice.
My low-sugar jerky is made per your order, from fresh (never frozen) beef that‚Äôs sourced from St. Michael, MN and freshly ground the day we get it from our processor (never pink slime in a tube from a grocery chain!). We strive to make each batch within 1-2 days and ship no later than 2 business days after it‚Äôs made, to provide you the freshest low sugar jerky. Ground meat jerky is easier to chew than jerky made from strips of muscle meat, because it‚Äôs got a more tender texture. We also occasionally make ground bison, ground elk, and ground chicken jerky (limited to supply availability).

name: The Bitcoin Bookshop
description:
The best place to buy bitcoin books in your own language.
-
Konsensus Network was founded in 2019 to publish the Finnish translation of The Bitcoin Standard. Niko Laamanen gathered a group of freedom-loving volunteers who rose to the occasion and delivered the first of many books to come. The effort was quickly replicated to translate the Portuguese and Dutch versions of Saifedean Ammous' best-selling book.

Our Growth:
Five years later, the network has published over 80 books, but this is only the beginning. Konsensus Network is a privately owned company that operates as a hub between authors, license holders, translators, distribution, and production channels.

Our Mission:
The original focus of the team has been to raise awareness about Bitcoin and making information accessible through books. As the process of normalization unfolds, the focus is shifting towards broader topics, such as economics and liberty. Our history and expertise, combined with our passion for books, put us in a great position.

name: Start9
description:
Take back control
Everything you do online is intermediated - your actions permissioned, your data custodied.

Opt out by running a private server.

Previously, this was only available to the tech savvy and the wealthy. Start9 levels the playing field by making it possible for everyone else.

name: Bitcoin Magazine Store
description:
The Bitcoin Magazine Store is an online retail platform offering a diverse range of Bitcoin-themed products. The store features print magazines including their latest "The Mining Issue," alongside books like "The Satoshi Papers" and "Fiat Ruins Everything." 

Their merchandise collection includes clothing (t-shirts, sweaters), accessories (hats, mugs), and even Bitcoin-themed Crocs. The store also sells hardware for Bitcoin storage and limited-edition art pieces including the "Fiat House of Cards," "Bitcoin War Bonds," and "Bukele Bucks" collections. 

For Bitcoin enthusiasts seeking collectibles, the store offers exclusive items through their "Bitcoin Originals" and "Pepenardo Collection." They accept Bitcoin payments via IBEX, ship from the US, and provide interest-free payment options for customers.

name: Compass Coffee
description:
That great coffee doesn't have to be complicated, fancy or hard to pronounce.

name: Jennifer Barton
description:
With over a decade of diverse design experience, I‚Äôve built a career that spans two great cities, Sydney and London. My
journey has taken me through a variety of roles in both agency and client-side environments. For seven years, I‚Äôve been
immersed in the dynamic landscape of the financial sector, while earlier in my career, I was fueling creativity in agencies
serving a wide range of industries, from music and entertainment to tech, retail, health, and travel.
My passion lies in staying productive and creative, and I‚Äôve learned that in business and design, there‚Äôs an art to balancing
the two. I‚Äôm not just about generating fresh and engaging ideas; I‚Äôm also enthusiastic about streamlining processes and
systematising my work for maximum efficiency without compromising on quality. This experience in both the artistic and
strategic sides of design positions me well for future endeavours in the field.

Whether you're a die-hard Bitcoiner or exploring the ethos of this transformative lifestyle, FOMO21 is here to help you wear your passion and spark conversations about a brighter, freer future.

description:
TURN HEADS WHEN YOU TURN THE CORNER
Check out the car detailing services we offer in Prairie du Chien and Onalaska, WI
One of the best ways to maintain the value of your vehicle long-term is with a ceramic coating. Luckily, EMN Paint Correction and Detailing provides top-quality ceramic coating, paint correction and car detailing services in Prairie du Chien and Onalaska, WI. Our local detailing company can make your truck, car, boat, motorcycle or camper look better than ever.

With a durable ceramic coating in place, you won‚Äôt have to worry about hard water spots, oxidation, bug etching, tree sap, road tar or brake dust bringing down your vehicle‚Äôs appearance.

name: Sweet Sats
description: SweetSats is Bitcoin only. Prices are listed in Sats, and payment is accepted only in Bitcoin. This site is self-hosted and payments are processed via BTCPay server direct to our node or Zaps sent to our self-custodial Lightning address. Meaning: there are no third parties involved. No tracking, no credit card processors, no sales tax, no bullshit. Simply trading pure honey, maple syrup and other homemade & homegrown products for Bitcoin!

name: Kagi Search
description:
Kagi Search is a highly accurate, lightning-fast, user-centric, 100% privacy-respecting search engine with results augmented by non-commercial indexes and personalized searches. Kagi features a clean, high-performance user interface with only the most relevant results and no telemetry, ads, or collection of private information. You can learn more about its unique features, including the use of Lenses and Personalized Results.

We are confident that Kagi will help you amplify your search abilities, become more creative in finding information, and accelerate your productivity.

name: Good Beans El Salvador Specialty Coffee Shop
description:
Hello from El Salvador! 

Welcome to GoodBeans! We're a small, passionate team of two people based in San Salvador, El Salvador, dedicated to bringing you the finest 100% Salvadoran coffees. We personally know every coffee grower we work with and practice direct trade without asking for discounts, ensuring fair prices for our farmers. By sourcing, processing, and roasting our strictly high-grown, specialty-grade beans locally, we guarantee the freshest coffee for you and the profits from the entire value chain staying at origin. We're 100% Salvadoran owned and operated. 

We strive to provide you with the best quality coffee beans, we roast every single week in order to have the freshest roasts available. 

Our commitment to quality goes beyond the beans. We take pride in experimenting with various processing methods to create unique and flavorful blends. Our signature blends and limited editions reflect the rich diversity of Salvadoran coffee. We love sharing our passion for coffee and invite you to join us on this journey, whether you‚Äôre a seasoned coffee aficionado or just starting to explore the world of specialty coffee.

We ship worldwide directly from El Salvador, so you can enjoy our exceptional coffee no matter where you are. Visit us online or drop by our shop for the perfect cup. We look forward to serving you!

name: Sown & Grown
description:
At Sown & Grown, our philosophy is empowering you, the consumer, to understand where your produce is coming from and how it was cultivated. Every purchase made from Sown & Grown helps us to help you gain this important insight. Use this page to gain an understanding of how we work to empower you to make better-informed choices.

Trust

The closer you are to the source of the produce, the greater the trust.  From our own farms, we guarantee every statement made about how our produce was cultivated. When sourcing from other farms, we gather as much information as possible from the farmers and pass their statements on to you. 

Our Mission

At Sown & Grown, our mission is to incentivize better, more wholesome farming practices in Central America. We aim to do that by empowering you, the consumer, to make better-informed choices about your food, and to hold food producers to higher standards of accountability. It is our hope that by enabling you to vote with your wallet, we can elevate farming practices in Central America to the benefit of everyone.

name: Adaptogenic Bliss

Potent herbal teas & adaptogen capsules for body, mind & soul. Harnessing Natures Magic.

At Adaptogenic Bliss, we harness the natural power of plants to create herbal teas and adaptogen capsules that nurture your physical, emotional, and mental well-being in today‚Äôs busy world.
a close up of a plant with green leaves

Our products blend ancient wisdom with modern wellness, helping you stay calm, grounded, and energized through life‚Äôs ups and downs. Discover the balance that nature can bring to your life.

name: Proof of Ink
description: At Proof of Ink, we‚Äôre driven by a love for Bitcoin and exceptional T-shirt art. Our mission is to partner with talented Bitcoin artists, turning their bold designs into high-quality, hand-crafted screen-printed T-shirts that are as unique as the blockchain itself. Each shirt is more than just clothing‚Äîit‚Äôs a wearable piece of art, a collectible, and a nod to the Bitcoin movement.

name: Obscura
description:
What makes Obscura different from existing VPNs?
Unlike VPNs with a ‚Äúno-logs‚Äù policy, Obscura is provably private by design.

Even ‚Äúno-logs‚Äù VPNs see both your identity and your internet activity, meaning you have to blindly trust their pinky-promise for privacy. This is exactly why some privacy-conscious folks will tell you not to use a VPN at all.

Obscura is different ‚Äì we never see your decrypted internet packets. It‚Äôs simply impossible for us to log your internet activity, even if we were compelled to, or if our servers were compromised.

name: Airbtc
description:
Welcome to Airbtc!
This project was born out of the dream to build a bitcoin only project. Something that operates completely out of the scope of the fiat world, with zero ties back to the legacy economy or banking system.

Airbtc is a property listing website similar to Airbnb, with the exception that we deal and operate ONLY in Bitcoin. This is a project for Bitcoiners, by Bitcoiners. We will never accept fiat currency or any other forms of crypto.

It is important to distinguish our project from platforms that enable bitcoin or ‚Äúcrypto‚Äù payment to a user, sell it, and pay the supplier in fiat. Although we do appreciate the importance of such platforms and projects as part of Bitcoin adoption, such projects are essentially fiat on and off-ramps and ultimately contribute very little to the circular Bitcoin economy.

The basic outline of our business is for hosts to upload their properties to our site and guests to book their accommodation through us. We will keep our guests‚Äô funds safe until after their stay is completed and then pay the host.

name: Tierra Bendita
description:
Practices that guarantee quality

Our agricultural best practices allow us to improve the ground‚Äôs fertility and to conserve water. As a result, taking the average elevation as below the 1000s MASL, we are able to keep a perferct balance in the specialty coffee production profile.

The best grains for the best cup of joe

Our planations harvest two different types of Arabica coffee, both of them tolerant as well as resistant to Coffee Rust, which has affected severely the economy of all the coffee producing latin-american countries.

From seed to cup

We provide a strict quality control, from drying to roasting, which allow us to provide quality grains from the seed to the cup.

Cherito Cafe Coffee

name: Sovran Systems
description:
Sovran Systems was created out of necessity from the ever growing reach of big tech and governments into our digital lives. Their systems promote greater surveillance and the closing of our privacy and digital freedom. Sovran Systems mission is to give us more choices outside of these monopolistic enterprises, which only seek to gain more control. We need practical hope from this dystopic technocratic nightmare.

Sovran Systems curates all the best privacy software into one system that is easy to use. We are grounded in Natural Law and are on the front lines of this battle to get all people to digital Freedom and digital Sovereignty.

Come join this computer movement to become the ultimate digital Freedom Warrior you were born to be!

name: Lighting Koffee
description:
Born in the mountains of Southwest Antioquia, Lightning Koffee emerges.

Coffee crafted with pure dedication and love. Each cup of Lightning Koffee offers flavors and aromas that captivate the senses, a result of high-quality cultivation and processing standards truly deserving of admiration.

Through innovation and the use of new technologies that allow our business to be global, we deliver the best coffee to the whole world. Our payment gateway enables the purchase of our products with alternative payment methods such as Bitcoin. We are pioneers! Taking pride in being the first coffee brand in South America and Colombia to sell for bitcoin.

name: CryptoCloaks
description:
CryptoCloaks LLC was born from the love of 3D printing and the idea of Bitcoin. Our passion for 3D design sparked in December of 2017 with our first product, a Ledger Nano S mount. This product allowed us to safely and securely keep the Ledger hidden. After the success from this mount we quickly grew and have been designing and manufacturing ever since, thanks to our customers who believe in our products!

We strive for quality products and innovative solutions for keeping your Bitcoin safe and looking great.

name: Peony Lane Wine
description:
Naked Wine, Elevated
Peony Lane wine has just one ingredient: grapes. Unlike most wines, ours are free from nasty chemicals. Located in the highest AVA in North America, we produce the continent's highest elevation natural wine.

HIGH ALTITUDE
At 5680' our vineyard produces the Highest Elevation natural wine in North America

NATURAL WINE
Natural wine emphasizes minimal intervention, sustainable practices, and organic farming, resulting in unique flavors and a healthier, more authentic product.

FAMILY OWNED
As a second-generation family-owned vineyard, we care as deeply about keeping nasty chemicals out of our vineyard as you do about keeping them out of your wine.

WILD FERMENTATION
Healthy soil, ample biodiversity, and minimal chemicals are required to promote quality natural yeasts. These yeasts ensure our wine has the complex flavors that truly reflect our unique terroir.

MINIMAL SULFITES
We use meticulous grape sourcing, gentle handling, and careful cellar practices. While all wines naturally contain sulfites, we add only a minimal amount at bottling for aging stability.

NO TOXIC ADDITIVES
Wines can contain up to 73 hidden chemical additives. At Peony Lane, we use only a touch of sulfites for aging stability, keeping our wine pure and natural.

name: oshi
description:
Artisan pecan butter, date bars and chocolates. Made in the Southeast USA. #hodlbar #hodlbutter

#### The Heart of Oshi
Oshi is my small-batch passion project - pecan butter, date bars, and chocolates - crafted right here in the Southeast USA. It began with curiosity and grew into something I love sharing. The pecans are local and top-notch, paired with certified organic, clean ingredients. No shortcuts - just honest flavor.
It starts with smooth, rich pecan butter. Then the dates with its rich texture and caramel flavor. The chocolates? Date bar filling in a chocolate shell bars, discs, or balls. Each batch is unique, sometimes a limited run, always made with care.

 **The Problem & Solution**
Pecan butter is like looking for a unicorn in stores, and what's there often hides sugars that dull its flavor. Most snacks and bars are loaded with grains, fillers, or artificial stuff, frustrating clean eaters. Grain-free folks struggle to find protein-rich snacks that taste amazing. Buying quality food means clunky payment systems too.
Oshi's got you covered. My Hodl Butter, crafted with local, organic Southeast USA pecans, boasts antioxidants - 400% more than almonds, 566% more than peanuts - low carbs (~4g per 2 tbsp), and heart-healthy fats (~12g monounsaturated). My Hodl Bars pair it with dates, packed with fiber (~2g per date) and potassium (~167mg), for a grain-free, protein-rich snack. The nutty, rich pecans and sweet, caramel-like dates create a flavor combo that's pure magic. Hodl Butter shines in recipes from smoothies to sauces, and you can buy it all with Bitcoin for a seamless, value-driven exchange.

#### Why Bitcoin?
We accept Bitcoin because it's more than payment - it's a mindset. I love skipping the middleman, trading directly with you. It's perfect for small makers like me and folks like you who value the real stuff. It's a circular economy: I craft, you enjoy, we trade value - no gatekeepers.
Bitcoin means freedom to me - building outside old systems, connecting with kindred spirits. Paying with it? You're not just buying - you're betting on a future we shape together.

name: Isolabellart
description:
Original oil paintings
Hi, I'm Carlo, an Italian painter.
I was born in Genoa (1970) and I studied art at the Liceo Artistico Nicol√≤ Barabino.
I never thought I would become a painter, in fact I worked and still work as a graphic designer for the press, first for publishing and currently for papermaking.
I abandoned art the way one lets things one cares about die, that is, without reason.
But the artistic passion, that never left me. In fact, I resumed painting after almost thirty years, out of love.
In April 2022, I decided to give my wife an oil portrait as a present and I thought, " ...if this painting comes out well and gives me satisfaction, I will start drawing and painting again, otherwise I will give up and abandon the idea forever".
Returning to painting after so long was not easy.
The portrait came out discreetly, but the satisfaction of executing it was enormous.
So I started displaying my paintings, first on Twitter, then on Instagram, and finally made this website.
Most of my paintings often depict places I have visited that particularly moved me, in a style inspired by impressionist masters, past and contemporary.
Thank you to everyone who has read this far and to those who will support my art.

name: Solo Satoshi
description:
Solo Satoshi is dedicated to the advancement of open-sourced Bitcoin mining, with a steadfast commitment to the security and decentralization of the Bitcoin network. As a pioneering force in the Bitcoin space, our mission is to empower individuals and businesses worldwide with innovative, secure, and decentralized mining solutions.

At Solo Satoshi, we believe in the transformative power of open-source software and the potential it holds for the future of Bitcoin mining. We strive to foster a community of developers and enthusiasts who share our vision of a more secure and decentralized Bitcoin landscape. Our dedication to open-source principles is at the heart of our mission, driving our commitment to transparency, collaboration, and innovation.

We are passionate about supporting the growth and development of the Bitcoin network, and we recognize the critical role that open-source software and developers play in achieving this goal. By promoting and contributing to the open-source ecosystem, we aim to facilitate a more robust and resilient Bitcoin network, ensuring its longevity and success for years to come.

At Solo Satoshi, our mission is not only to provide cutting-edge mining solutions but also to educate and inspire others about the importance of decentralization and open-source principles in the Bitcoin space. We believe that by working together, we can create a future where Bitcoin mining is more accessible, efficient, and aligned with the core values of decentralization and open collaboration.
